data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Vizianagaram access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 25,790 believers in Vizianagaram to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 190 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Bagata people. Make the Bagata people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Vizianagaram do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Vizianagaram, Andhra Pradesh, India has a population of 2,344,500.

We estimate Vizianagaram has 25,790 people who might know Jesus, 28,447 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,290,264 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 25,790 believers find a person of peace today among the 2,318,711 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”
